content.json:
# [Cofense Intelligence Threat Indicators](https://www.threathq.com)
---

Cofense Intelligence is a human-vetted phishing-threat intelligence service that provides accurate and timely alerts and in-depth analysis to strengthen your enterprise's ability to quickly identify and respond to phishing attacks in progress.

content.query:
ThreatIntelligenceIndicator
// Select cofense indicators from the table
| where SourceSystem == "Cofense Intelligence"
// latest data of cofense indicator to avoid duplicates
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by ExternalIndicatorId
// Create a new column to identify the type of indicator, IP, Domain, URL, File, or Other
| extend IndicatorType = iif(isnotempty(EmailSourceIpAddress) or isnotempty(NetworkDestinationIP) or isnotempty(NetworkIP) or isnotempty(NetworkSourceIP) or isnotempty(NetworkCidrBlock), "IP",
                        iff(isnotempty(Url), "URL",
                        iff(isnotempty(EmailRecipient) or isnotempty(EmailSenderAddress), "Email",
                        iff(isnotempty(FileHashValue), "File",
                         iff(isnotempty(DomainName) or isnotempty(EmailSourceDomain), "Domain",
                        "Other")))))
// Summarize and order the data, then render the chart
| summarize CountOfIndicators = count() by IndicatorType, bin(TimeGenerated, 1h),SourceSystem
| order by CountOfIndicators desc 
| render barchart kind=stacked
content.title: Number of Cofense Intelligence Indicators Imported into Sentinel by Indicator Type and Date
Number of Cofense Intelligence Indicators Imported into Sentinel by Indicator Provider and Date
Number of Active Cofense Intelligence Indicators by Indicator Type
Number of Active Cofense Intelligence Indicators by Indicator Source
Number of Active Cofense Intelligence Indicators by Confidence Score
Uniqueness of Cofense Threat Intelligence Sources

content.query:
ThreatIntelligenceIndicator
| where SourceSystem == "Cofense Intelligence"
| where Tags != ""
| parse Tags with * "[\"threatID-" threat_id "\"]"
| extend threat_id = toreal(threat_id)
| join kind=inner Malware_Data_CL on $left.threat_id == $right.id_d
// latest data of cofense indicator to avoid duplicates 
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by ExternalIndicatorId
| extend Ioc = case(ThreatType == "File", FileHashValue, 
                    ThreatType == "URL", Url,
                       DomainName)
| order by TimeGenerated desc
| project ["Threat ID"]=threat_id, ["Confidence Score"]=ConfidenceScore, ["Threat Type"]=ThreatType, ["IOC"]=Ioc, Label=label_s, ["Last Published"]=unixtime_microseconds_todatetime(lastPublished_d*1000), ["First Published"]=unixtime_microseconds_todatetime(firstPublished_d*1000), ["Threat Detail URL"]=threatDetailURL_s, ["Download Report (HTML)"]=ReportDownload_HTML__s, ["Download Report (PDF)"]=ReportDownload_PDF__s, ["Executive Summary"]=executiveSummary_s
content.title: Cofense Intelligence Threat Indicators Data
